description: The European Investment Trust plc \n\nThe Company announces that on 3 April 2019 it purchased the following number of its ordinary shares of 25 pence each on the main market of the London Stock... | April 3, 2019
text:
The European Investment Trust plc (“the Company”)
The Company announces that on 3 April 2019 it purchased the following number of its ordinary shares of 25 pence each on the main market of the London Stock Exchange.
Ordinary Shares:
Date of purchase:
3 April 2019
Number of ordinary shares purchased:
10,000
Lowest price per share
808.00p
Highest price per share
808.00p
The Company intends to cancel the purchased shares.
Following the above transaction, the Company has 40,370,269 ordinary shares in issue. Each of the Company\'s shares carries one vote. Accordingly, the total number of voting rights of the Company is 40,370,269.
3 April 2019
LEI: 213800QNN9EHZ4SC1R12

title: European Investment Trust : Transaction in Own Shares
